author: TravisEz13
body:
<!--

If it is a bug report:
- make sure you are able to repro it on the latest released version. 
You can install the latest version from https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases
- Search the existing issues.
- Refer to the [FAQ](../docs/FAQ.md).
- Refer to the [known issues](../docs/KNOWNISSUES.md).
- Fill out the following repro template

If it's not a bug, please remove the template and elaborate the issue in your own words.
-->
## Steps to reproduce

On Linux,

``` powershell
write-progress test
```
## Expected behavior

no error
## Actual behavior

```
write-progress : The method or operation is not implemented.out-lineoutput : The method or operation is not implemented.
Write-Progress : Cannot bind parameter 'Id'. Cannot convert value "method" to
type "System.Int32". Error: "Input string was not in a correct format."
At line:1 char:22
+ write-progress : The method or operation is not implemented.out-lineo ...
+                      ~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : InvalidArgument: (:) [Write-Progress], Parameter
   BindingException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : CannotConvertArgumentNoMessage,Microsoft.PowerSh
   ell.Commands.WriteProgressCommand
```
## Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

``` powershell
> $PSVersionTable
PS /home/travisez13> $PSVersionTable

Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      5.1.10032.0
PSEdition                      Linux
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
CLRVersion                     4.0.30319.34011
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0
WSManStackVersion              1.0
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1


```

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: Not sure how difficult the implementation is here, but we do have a couple customer scenarios blocked on this one.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Ah I knew I forgot something. I wanted to get this for 0.6 but got held up on #1283.

title: Write-Progress fails on Linux
